transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello good morning sir. Hello. Mai Shashi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se. Ha hello.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji mam boliye.
Executive: Ji mai Shashi bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir aapka ek call receive hua tha na sir ye Indian fruits ke liye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To sir ne bola tha sir nikalne tak connect karne ke liye fir uske baad aap connect nahi ho paye the yaha se.
Customer: Kaha hai apne paas Indian Indian Indian Indian fal ki kaha hai requirement bataiye. Kaha apne paas paas me aa rahi hai.
Executive: Indian fruit aapko ha sir mai sun rahi hu.
Customer: Mam koi dusre number se baat karo aap hai na is number se mere ko aawaz kam aa rahi hai.
Executive: Aawaz kat ke aa rahi hai dusre number se baat karo. Ji ji jo sunna. Jo primary wala tha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not able to hear clearly.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to connect from another number.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, voice issue, connection
